titles.title: I Will Enter His Gates With Thanksgiving In My Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will enter His gates with thanksgiving in my heart.
I will enter His courts with praise.
I will say this is the day that the Lord hath made.
I will rejoice for He hath made me glad.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He hath made me glad. He hath made me glad.
I will rejoice for He hath made me glad.
He hath made me glad. He hath made me glad.
I will rejoice for He hath made me glad.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Entrare por sus puertas con accion de gracias,
Por sus atrios con alabanza.
Y dire este es el dia que hizo el Jehova.
Le alabo pues el me alegro.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
El me alegro. el me alegro.
Le alabo, pues el me alegro. (2x)
